doc:
Olivier Marchal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olivier_Marchal 0 Olivier Marchal (born 14 November 1958) is a French actor, director, screenwriter, and a former policeman. In 2005, he was nominated for three César Awards (best director, best film and best writing) for his film 36 Quai des Orfèvres. He also created the popular French television police drama Braquo and wrote and directed some episodes in its first season (2009). Olivier_Marchal ( born 14_November_1958 ) is a_French_actor , director , screenwriter , and a_former_policeman . In 2005 , he was_nominated for three_César_Awards (_best_director , best_film_and_best_writing_) for his_film_36_Quai_des_Orfèvres . He also created the_popular_French_television_police_drama_Braquo and wrote and directed some_episodes in its_first_season ( 2009_) .
